column1: Daily Weather Observations for Tindal RAAF, Northern Territory for June 2025
Prepared at 16:03 UTC on Saturday 16 August 2025   IDCJDW8048.202506
Tindal RAAF base is 14 km ESE of Katherine. Meteorological observations at Tindal RAAF are used to represent conditions in Katherine.
Some cloud observations are from automated equipment; these are somewhat different to those made by a human observer and may not appear every day.
Observations were drawn from Tindal RAAF {station 014932}
